title: Hermes Application Package Manifest Schema
description:
Defines the src packages which are used to build a Hermes Application.
It is important that one of the properties `www` or `share` is set or `module` array has at least one item.
If all of them are not set and `modules` array is empty, an application cannot be built.

$schema.title: Application Package Manifest Schema Reference
$schema.description:
Reference to the Application Manifest Schema.
Should be to https:// this will be validated.
Local references are only to simplify development.

name.title: Hermes Application Package name.
name.description: Name of the Hermes application package with which it will be created.

metadata.title: Application Metadata File
metadata.description:
Link to the Hermes application metadata JSON file.
Will be renamed to `metadata.json` inside the package.
It Could be a valid URI or regular local path on your system.

modules.title: Application Module Files
modules.description: List of WASM Component Library Module Files.

file.title: Application WASM Module Package File
file.description: Path to the WASM Component Library Module Package File.

name.title: Application WASM Module Name
name.description:
Name of the WASM Component Library Module.
Must be unique within the Application.
If not defined is extracted from the WASM Module itself.

config.title: Application WASM Module Config
config.description:
Path to the WASM Component Library Module Config File.
This will replace any `config.json` inside the module.
If defined it must be valid according to the modules `config.schema.json` file.

share.title: Application WASM Module Package Share Dataset.
share.description:
Path to the WASM Component Library Module Shareable Data.
Will replace or augment any data defined within the module itself.

www.title: Data to be served to a browser at the applications URL from /
www.description:
A Directory or archive of data to be served to a browser for the App.
It Could be a valid URI or regular local path on your system.

share.title: Data to be shared amongst all modules within the application.
share.description:
A Directory or archive of data to be shared with all Modules in the application.
It Could be a valid URI or regular local path on your system.
